# AudioFX Pro - LLMs.txt

## About
AudioFX Pro is a free, browser-based audio processing tool that allows users to apply professional audio effects to their audio files. All processing happens client-side using Web Audio API, ensuring complete privacy and security.

## Website
https://www.audiofxpro.com

## Key Features
- Lofi audio effect with lowpass filtering
- Reverb effect with adjustable room size and wet/dry mix
- Delay/echo effect with configurable delay time and feedback
- Distortion effect with adjustable amount
- Pitch shifting (semitone adjustment)
- Lowpass and highpass filters
- Volume/gain control
- Real-time audio processing
- Client-side processing (privacy-focused)
- Free to use, no registration required
- Works on all modern browsers and devices

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js 16 and React 19
- Uses Web Audio API for audio processing
- TypeScript for type safety
- Responsive design for all devices
- Zero server-side audio processing (all client-side)

## Audio Effects Details

### Lofi Effect
- Applies lowpass filter to create vintage, warm sound
- Configurable frequency cutoff (200-8000 Hz)
- Perfect for creating nostalgic, lo-fi aesthetics

### Reverb Effect
- Simulated reverb using delay nodes
- Adjustable room size (0-1)
- Wet/dry mix control (0-1)
- Dampening control for reverb tail

### Delay Effect
- Echo/delay effect with configurable timing
- Delay time: 0-2 seconds
- Feedback control: 0-1
- Wet/dry mix: 0-1

### Distortion
- Wave shaping distortion
- Amount control: 0-1
- 4x oversampling for quality

### Pitch Shifting
- Semitone adjustment: -12 to +12
- Uses playback rate adjustment
- Maintains audio quality

### Filters
- Lowpass filter: 200-20000 Hz
- Highpass filter: 20-5000 Hz
- Biquad filter implementation

## Supported Formats
- MP3
- MPEG
- M4A
- WAV
- OGG
- OGA
- FLAC
- AAC
- WMA
- OPUS
- WEBM
- 3GP
- AMR
- AIFF
- AU
- RA
- Any format supported by the browser's AudioContext

## Output Format
- WAV format
- 16-bit PCM
- Original sample rate maintained
- Stereo or mono based on input

## Privacy & Security
- All processing happens in the user's browser
- No audio files are uploaded to any server
- No data collection or tracking
- No user registration required
- Completely free and open

## Use Cases
- Music production
- Podcast editing
- Sound design
- Audio experimentation
- Learning audio effects
- Content creation
- Personal projects
- Commercial projects (allowed)

## Contact
For questions or feedback, visit: https://www.audiofxpro.com/contact

## License
Free to use for personal and commercial projects.
